item.title: COUNT, SUM, AVG
item.author: slh.peyman@gmail.com (Peyman Salehi)
item.description: COUNT returns the number of rows for a column. -- return the number of all users SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users; -- +-------+ -- | count | -- |-------| -- | 502 | -- +-------+ -- find the number of orders by each user SELECT COUNT(*), user_id FROM orders GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id; -- +-------+---------+ -- | count | user_id | -- |-------+---------| -- | 2 | 1 | -- | 1 | 2 | -- | 3 | 3 | -- | 4 | 4 | -- .

item.title: MIN, MAX
item.author: slh.peyman@gmail.com (Peyman Salehi)
item.description: MIN returns the smallest value of a column. MAX returns the biggest value of a column. -- return the lowest total_price from orders of user with id of 10 SELECT MIN(total_price) FROM orders WHERE user_id = 10; -- +------+ -- | min | -- |------| -- | 1132 | -- +------+ -- return the highest total_price from the orders of user with id of 10 SELECT MAX(total_price) FROM orders WHERE user_id = 10; -- +------+ -- | max | -- |------| -- | 1998 | -- +------+ PostgreSQL docs
